name: 劉恩英
objective:
本課程使學生具有基礎韓語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力等 TOPIK1 訓練。
The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Korean abilities for TOPIK and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Korean language.
